Module com.ang.peLib
Package com.ang.peLib.files

Class PFileWriter

java.lang.Object
com.ang.peLib.files.PFileWriter
public class PFileWriter extends Object
Provides methods for writing lines to resource files.

  • Method Details

    • newFile

      public static void newFile(com.ang.peLib.resources.PResourceType resourceType, String name) throws com.ang.peLib.exceptions.PResourceException
      Creates a new resource file with a specified name. The path to the new file is specified by the resource type. The resource manager specifies a path from the resources directory to the directory where each type is stored.
      Parameters:
      resourceType - the type of resource to be stored in the file
      name - name of the file to create
      Throws:
      com.ang.peLib.exceptions.PResourceException - if there is a problem with creating the file
      See Also:
      • PResourceManager
      • PResourceType

    • writeToFile

      public static void writeToFile(com.ang.peLib.resources.PResourceType resourceType, String name, String line) throws com.ang.peLib.exceptions.PResourceException
      Writes to an existing resource file with a specified name. Overrides writeToFile to write a single string to the file.

      The path to the file is specified by the resource type. The resource manager specifies a path from the resources directory to the directory where each type is stored.

      Parameters:
      resourceType - the type of resource stored in the file
      name - name of the file to write to
      line - the line to write to the file
      Throws:
      com.ang.peLib.exceptions.PResourceException - if there is a problem with creating the file
      See Also:
      • writeToFile(PResourceType, String, String[])
      • PResourceManager
      • PResourceType

    • writeToFile

      public static void writeToFile(com.ang.peLib.resources.PResourceType resourceType, String name, String[] lines) throws com.ang.peLib.exceptions.PResourceException
      Writes to an existing resource file with a specified name. The path to the file is specified by the resource type. The resource manager specifies a path from the resources directory to the directory where each type is stored.
      Parameters:
      resourceType - the type of resource stored in the file
      name - name of the file to write to
      lines - the lines to write to the file
      Throws:
      com.ang.peLib.exceptions.PResourceException - if there is a problem with creating the file
      See Also:
      • writeToFile(PResourceType, String, String)
      • PResourceManager
      • PResourceType
